trans-unit.source: The DirSyncRequestControl class is a directory control that enables the application to search the directory for objects that have changed since a previous state.
trans-unit.target: DirSyncRequestControl 类是一个目录控件，使应用程序要搜索以前的状态后已被更改的对象的目录。

trans-unit.source: The DirSyncRequestControl constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirSyncRequestControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: DirSyncRequestControl 构造函数创建的实例<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirSyncRequestControl"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The DirSyncRequestControl constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirSyncRequestControl"></xref> class using the specified parameter.
trans-unit.target: DirSyncRequestControl 构造函数创建的实例<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirSyncRequestControl"></xref>类使用指定的参数。

trans-unit.source: An opaque structure used by the server.
trans-unit.target: 使用服务器的不透明结构。

trans-unit.source: It is updated by the directory during each <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest"></xref>, which enables the control to incrementally read changes from the directory.
trans-unit.target: 在每个过程，通过目录更新<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest"> </xref>，从而使控件能够以增量方式从目录读取更改。

trans-unit.source: The DirSyncRequestControl constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirSyncRequestControl"></xref> class using the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: DirSyncRequestControl 构造函数创建的实例<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirSyncRequestControl"></xref>类使用指定的参数。

trans-unit.source: An opaque structure used by the server.
trans-unit.target: 使用服务器的不透明结构。

trans-unit.source: It is updated by the directory during each <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest"></xref>, which enables the control to incrementally read changes from the directory.
trans-unit.target: 在每个过程，通过目录更新<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest"> </xref>，从而使控件能够以增量方式从目录读取更改。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the behavior of the search.
trans-unit.target: 指定搜索的行为。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be zero or a combination of one or more of the values of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectorySynchronizationOptions"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此参数可以为零个或一个或多个的值的组合<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectorySynchronizationOptions"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The DirSyncRequestControl constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirSyncRequestControl"></xref> class using the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: DirSyncRequestControl 构造函数创建的实例<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirSyncRequestControl"></xref>类使用指定的参数。

trans-unit.source: An opaque structure used by the server.
trans-unit.target: 使用服务器的不透明结构。

trans-unit.source: It is updated by the directory during each <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest"></xref>, which enables the control to incrementally read changes from the directory.
trans-unit.target: 在每个过程，通过目录更新<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest"> </xref>，从而使控件能够以增量方式从目录读取更改。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the behavior of the search.
trans-unit.target: 指定搜索的行为。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be zero or a combination of one or more of the values of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectorySynchronizationOptions"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此参数可以为零个或一个或多个的值的组合<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectorySynchronizationOptions"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of attributes to return.
trans-unit.target: 属性以返回最大数目。

trans-unit.source: The default is 1048576.
The AttributeCount property specifies the maximum number of attributes to return.
trans-unit.target: AttributeCount 属性指定要返回属性的最大数。

trans-unit.source: The default value of this property is 1048576.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的默认值为 1048576。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of attributes to return.
trans-unit.target: 属性以返回最大数目。

trans-unit.source: There was an attempt to set a value less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 试图设置一个值小于零。

trans-unit.source: The Cookie property contains an opaque structure used by the server.
trans-unit.target: Cookie 属性包含由服务器使用的不透明结构。

trans-unit.source: This property is updated by the directory during each <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest>, which enables the control to incrementally read changes from the directory.
trans-unit.target: 此属性在每个过程更新目录<xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest>，从而使控件能够以增量方式从目录读取更改。</xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest>

trans-unit.source: An opaque structure used by the server.
trans-unit.target: 使用服务器的不透明结构。

trans-unit.source: The GetValue method returns the data associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: GetValue 方法返回与此控件关联的数据。

trans-unit.source: The data associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: 与此控件关联的数据。

trans-unit.source: The Option property specifies the behavior of the search.
trans-unit.target: 选项属性指定的搜索的行为。

trans-unit.source: This property can be zero or a combination of one or more of the values of <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectorySynchronizationOptions>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可以是零个或一个或多个<xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectorySynchronizationOptions>.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectorySynchronizationOptions>的值的组合

trans-unit.source: The behavior of the search.
trans-unit.target: 搜索的行为。
